extendedInfo.description: *Learn Cantonese is our 12th language in the successful Learn Series!!* Learn Cantonese is an easy to use mobile phrasebook that will give visitors to Hong Kong, Macau and those who are interested in learning Cantonese a good start in the language. Learn Cantonese is recorded using a native speaker and we have tried our best to be authentic in the pronunciation whilst ensuring it is easy to understand. Recommended app for tourists and business people visiting Hong Kong and Macau. Lite version contains 300+ common words and phrases included for FREE. Upgrade and unlock all 900+ phrases in 18 categories.FEATURES* Carefully translated list of essential phrases* High quality audio pronunciation by native speaker* Play all phrases automatically in each category* Ability to adjust font size* No internet connection required* Highlight important words with tips* Store frequently used phrases in favourites* Search by keywords* No adverts or annoying popupsCATEGORIES FREE Categories: * Greetings* General conversation* Numbers* Directions and places* Transportation* Eating outUpgrade and unlock all 900+ phrases in these categories.https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.codegent.apps.learn.cantonesepro* Time and date* Accommodation* Shopping* Colours* Towns and provinces* Countries* Tourist attractions* Family* Dating* Emergency* Feeling sick* Tongue twistersFEEDBACKIf you like this app and find it useful please take a few seconds to give us a rating in the Android Market. For comments and suggestions please send an email to apps@codegent.com. We love getting feedback from users of our apps.Follow us on twitter : http://www.twitter.com/codegentapps

reviews.title: THANK YOU!
reviews.comment: Some one understands me.  We should have cantonese.  If I can rate 100 stars, I strongly would.  I have a Facebook page called Save the Cantonese.  I defintley post that app on page only if the owner says yes,  like my page calles Save The Cantonese.
reviews.author: Kentren Yeh

reviews.title: \342\231\252Im learning\342\231\252

reviews.title: Wonderful Cantonese Learning App
reviews.comment: I have been looking for a Cantonese Learning application for a long time and have downloaded several paid and free apps. However this one is the best. You can easily learn simple phrases to communicate with Cantonese speaking people and best of all its free to try!
reviews.author: Ross Miller

reviews.title: Very useful application!!
